ad_account_id.description: The ID of the advertising account associated with the conversion tag.

code_snippet.description: The JavaScript code snippet that needs to be placed on the website for tracking conversions.

enhanced_match_status.description: The status of enhanced match capabilities for the conversion tag.

id.description: The unique identifier of the conversion tag.

last_fired_time_ms.description: The timestamp of the last conversion event fired by the tag in milliseconds.

name.description: The name or label assigned to the conversion tag.

status.description: The current status of the conversion tag (e.g., active, inactive).

version.description: The version number or revision of the conversion tag.

configs.description: Contains configurations related to conversion tags

aem_enabled.description: Indicates if Adobe Experience Manager integration is enabled for the conversion tag.

md_frequency.description: The frequency at which match data is processed for the conversion tag.

aem_fnln_enabled.description: Indicates if AEM Facebook Login integration is enabled for the conversion tag.

aem_ph_enabled.description: Indicates if AEM Phone integration is enabled for the conversion tag.

aem_ge_enabled.description: Indicates if AEM Google Events integration is enabled for the conversion tag.

aem_db_enabled.description: Indicates if AEM DoubleClick integration is enabled for the conversion tag.

aem_loc_enabled.description: Indicates if AEM Locations integration is enabled for the conversion tag.
